title: In primary school, everyone read books, but now I’m in high school and I am basically the only one who still reads. Why is this? - Quora

response.answer_text: you’ve out lived your time. but, high school is a model of some deranged socialist’s idea of hygienic thinking. they can delete nasty and sexist and racist books on the net really easily. burning a book pollutes the air and that’s a dilemma for thoroughly modern marxists.
You’re not just reading easy-peasy children’s books that coddle your sensibilities anymore. Now your books have long sentences and difficult ideas.
